Literature.Title: A Biosurfactant-Inspired Heptapeptide with Improved Specificity to Kill MRSA.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Ding S, Dietrich R, Märtlbauer E, Zhu K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus amyloliquefaciens ATCC 23842(MIC=>128µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=>128µg/ml),Bacillus licheniformis ATCC 14580(MIC=>128µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis 1F-1(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis A4(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium 5F-10(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium 4W-9(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 215(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica ATCC H9812(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 35659(MIC=>128µg/ml)
